articles.description: ICC Hall of Famer Ricky Ponting has provided his thoughts on whether Steve Smith will appear at this year's ICC Men's T20 World Cup and predicted who will be named Australia’s captain in the shortest format.
articles.content: Smith's spot in the squad of 15 isnt the only query surrounding the set-up of the Australian team in the lead-up to this year's T20 World Cup, with the role of captain still up for grabs following Aa… [+1398 chars]
